We also offer a buy back guarantee, free valets and road worthy warranty, including our own RMi approved workshop at your service and that is not all, we also offer you a free glaze on your car with a 1year warranty on the glaze. Applications can be done telephonically and feedback given within 30min. Terms and conditions

attributes.description:
BB Motor Group is a well-established franchise with a wide variety of new & pre-owned vehicles, service departments & parts. As part of a 60-year legacy, we strive to exceed the expectations of all potential & existing customers.

To establish & ensure peace of mind, trust and long lasting relationships with our clients, a detailed workshop quality inspection is done on each of our pre-loved vehicles, along with a roadworthy test, full valet & body polish.

Our excellent sales manager, Werner Delport, works closely with his team to ensure competitive offers & excellent service is produced. Request a call back & one of our professionals will contact you.

We welcome all trade-ins & deliver nation-wide on request.

#BBWelkom
#ExceedingAllExpectations

We are South Africa's biggest Volkswagen, Audi, Select and Commercial vehicle dealer network.When you buy a Volkswagen, you know you are getting so much more than just a car.
